Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class ClientManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.ClientManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisconnectListener, EventListener
public class ClientManager extends Object implements DisconnectListener
Class to manage the virtual clients connected to the server.
